title: 36 Easy DIY Gifts To Impress Everyone on Your List
author: Mindful Momma
description: Roundup of 36 easy DIY gifts including homemade food gifts, homemade natural beauty products and eco-friendly, reusable gifts for the home.
cleaned_text: including homemade food gifts, natural beauty products and reusable items for the home. There's something to please everyone here and it's a bonus that these gifts are healthy, eco-friendly and affordable! Do you struggle to think of gift ideas for certain people on your list? Maybe you have no idea what they like but you want to give them a little token of your appreciation? Or perhaps you want to give something special but you need to watch your budget? Or maybe you just love DIY and are looking for unique homemade gift ideas! Whether it's for a teacher, your best friend or your mother-in-law, a homemade gift can be the perfect solution to your gift giving dilemmas! 36 Easy DIY Gifts I may receive commissions from purchases made through links in this article. [Full Disclosure](https://mindfulmomma.com/privacy-policy/) To help you with your gift giving this year, I've put together a roundup of 36 of my favorite DIY gifts - including homemade food gifts, natural beauty products and some reusable, eco-friendly gifts for the home. Don't worry - these homemade gifts aren't super complicated or endless time-consuming. Even people who don't consider themselves super crafty can pull off these easy DIY wins! You may already have the ingredients in your cupboard for some of these gifts like sugar scrubs or spiced nuts. Others require a few ingredients easily picked up at a natural food store or online. We're not talking weeks of preparation. Once you've got the supplies, we're talking an hour or two at most (some much less), to make these DIY gifts. Sometimes the most special gift of all is something that is homemade. You can do this! RELATED: [Green & Healthy Gifts For Everyone on Your List](https://mindfulmomma.com/green-healthy-gifts/) Luxurious DIY Gifts - Homemade Beauty Products What I love about the gift of homemade beauty products - like scrubs, balms and bath soaks - is that you are inviting the recipient to pamper themselves! Tell me who wouldn't love that excuse?!! Package up beauty gifts in [beautiful jars](https://www.amazon.com/Glass-Favor-Jars-Cork-Lids/dp/B073VHVMF2/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&qid=1541521717&sr=8-4&keywords=glass+jar+cork+lid&linkCode=sl1&tag=mindmomm099-20&linkId=d5265d755606dae2e1e372521f2035db&language=en_US) or gift bags. Include a wooden spoon or [wood scoop](https://www.amazon.com/Perfect-Stix-Scoop-3-10ct-Scooper/dp/B00HZANQOK/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&qid=1541523071&sr=8-3&keywords=small+wooden+scoops&linkCode=sl1&tag=mindmomm099-20&linkId=68aa9f2ce9bebbec4eb2d5ba30cc96ab&language=en_US) if that makes sense. Homemade natural beauty gifts are so special and indulgent - they are always a hit! Here are my favorite natural beauty gift ideas: [Customizable Facial Oil](https://mindfulmomma.com/diy-facial-oil/) from Mindful Momma [Essential Oil Perfume Blend](https://helloglow.co/essential-oil-perfume/) from Hello Glow [Botanical Soap Bars](https://gardentherapy.ca/botanical-soap/) from Garden Therapy [Customizable Face Scrub ](https://mindfulmomma.com/homemade-face-scrub/)from Mindful Momma [Brown Sugar Vanilla Body Scrub](https://nofussnatural.com/diy-brown-sugar-vanilla-body-scrub/) from No Fuss Natural [DIY Cleansing Balm](https://mindfulmomma.com/diy-cleansing-balm/) from Mindful Momma [Milk & Honey Bath Melts](https://brendid.com/moisture-rich-milk-and-honey-bath-melts-to-soothe) from Bren Did [Homemade Lip Balm ](https://mindfulmomma.com/homemade-lip-balm/)from Mindful Momma [Sugar Scrub from Glow [Relaxation Bath Salts](https://www.mommypotamus.com/homemade-bath-salts-recipe/) [Whipped Body Butter](https://mindfulmomma.com/2013/04/tutorial-homemade-whipped-body-butter.html) from Mindful Momma [Rosewater Toner](https://www.thehealthymaven.com/2015/08/how-to-make-homemade-rosewater.html) from The Healthy Maven [Soap on a Rope](https://helloglow.co/soap-on-a-rope/) by Hello Glow [Fizzy Bath Bombs](https://mindfulmomma.com/fizzy-bath-bombs/) from Mindful Momma [Pumpkin Spice Bath Tea](https://www.lifenreflection.com/diy-pumpkin-spice-bath-tea/) from Life-N-Reflection Unique DIY Gifts for the Home Eco-friendly, [reusable gifts](https://mindfulmomma.com/practically-green-gifts-that-keep-on-giving/) are some of my favorite gifts to give. They are super practical and can be used over and over again, but they are still special because they are handmade. These DIY's may take a little more time than the food or beauty gifts - but are totally worth it for an extra special gift! Here are my favorite handmade gifts for the home: [DIY Beeswax Wraps](https://mindfulmomma.com/diy-beeswax-wraps/) from Mindful Momma [Lemon Beeswax Candles](https://apumpkinandaprincess.com/diy-lemon-beeswax-candle/) from A Pumpkin and A Princess [Upcycled Map Coasters](https://www.popsugar.com/smart-living/Upcycled-Map-Tile-Coasters-35068845) from Pop Sugar [Marbled Clay Ring Dish](https://abeautifulmess.com/marbled-clay-ring-dish/) from A Beautiful Mess [Herbal Drawer Fresheners](https://gardentherapy.ca/herbal-drawer-fresheners/) from Garden Therapy Lavender Eye Pillow from Hello Glow [Etched Wooden Spoons](https://mindfulmomma.com/how-to-make-etched-wooden-spoons/) from Mindful Momma [Stenciled Tea Towels](https://www.number-2-pencil.com/stenciled-tea-towels-6/) from Number Two Pencil [Unpaper Towels](https://abeautifulmess.com/2018/03/unpaper-towel-diy-they-are-reuseable.html) by A Beautiful Mess [DIY Snack Bags](https://mindfulmomma.com/diy-snack-and-sandwich-bags/) from Mindful Momma Easy DIY Homemade Food Gifts Food gifts are the BEST because everyone eats! I don't know anyone who wouldn't be thrilled to get a bag of homemade granola or spiced nuts, or a jar of specialty nut butter or a homemade spice blend. Package up homemade food gifts in [cellophane bags](https://www.amazon.com/Clear-Plastic-Cello-Twist-Colors/dp/B01N3JJNRB/ref=as_li_ss_tl?s=home-garden&ie=UTF8&qid=1541520722&sr=1-4&keywords=cellophane+bags&linkCode=sl1&tag=mindmomm099-20&linkId=a23aab0021d796a50b8f44d3d5199fd7&language=en_US) or [glass jars](https://www.amazon.com/Weck-762-Tulip-Jelly-Jar/dp/B00F739OFC/ref=as_li_ss_tl?s=kitchen&ie=UTF8&qid=1541520567&sr=1-8&keywords=weck+jars&linkCode=sl1&tag=mindmomm099-20&linkId=04e5676a60fbbe8788c954ec0f65553b&language=en_US) with ribbon and a [food gift tag](https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6220&awinaffid=279839&clickref=&p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.etsy.com%2Flisting%2F644079889%2Fmade-with-love-gift-tags-set-of-6-mason%3F) or sticker. Consider including the recipe so they can make the item for themselves. Homemade food gifts look impressive and taste delicious - a double win!
